languages.text: "Какая неприкрытая ненависть, Зауэрбэк. Этого, пожалуй, достаточно, чтобы обвинить вас в ереси".

traits.locale_text: "Какая неприкрытая ненависть, Зауэрбек. Этого достаточно, чтобы обвинить вас в ереси".

languages.text: "Your unveiled hatred for me is so obvious, Sauerback, it is grounds enough to charge you with heresy."
languages.original_text: "Какая неприкрытая ненависть, Зауэрбэк. Этого, пожалуй, достаточно, чтобы обвинить вас в ереси".

traits.locale_text: "Such open hatred, Sauerback. This is quite enough to accuse you of heresy."
"Such open hatred, Sauerback. This is quite enough to accuse you of heresy."
"Your grudge is so obvious, Sauerback, it is enough to accuse you of heresy."
"Your grudge is so obvious, Sauerback, it is enough to accuse you of heresy."
"Your unveiled hatred for me is so obvious, Sauerback, it is grounds enough to charge you with heresy."
"Your unveiled hatred for me is so obvious, Sauerback, it is grounds enough to charge you with heresy."

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック、お前の私に対する憎しみは明白だ。それは、お前を異端として告発するに足る根拠となる」
languages.original_text: "Your unveiled hatred for me is so obvious, Sauerback, it is grounds enough to charge you with heresy."

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック、お前の私に対する憎しみは明白だ。それは、お前を異端として告発するに足る根拠となる」

languages.text: “你丝毫不掩饰你对我的敌意，苏尔贝克。光凭这点，我就能判你异端之罪。”
languages.original_text: "Your unveiled hatred for me is so obvious, Sauerback, it is grounds enough to charge you with heresy."

traits.locale_text: “你丝毫不掩饰你对我的敌意，苏尔贝克。光凭这点，我就能判你异端之罪。”

languages.text: « La haine que vous me témoignez ouvertement suffirait à vous faire accuser d'hérésie, Macharius. »
languages.original_text: "Your unveiled hatred for me is so obvious, Sauerback, it is grounds enough to charge you with heresy."

traits.locale_text: « La haine que vous me témoignez ouvertement suffirait à vous faire accuser d'hérésie, Macharius. »

languages.text: «Ni siquiera intenta disimular el odio que siente por mí, Sauerback. Es motivo suficiente para acusarle de traición».
languages.original_text: "Your unveiled hatred for me is so obvious, Sauerback, it is grounds enough to charge you with heresy."

traits.locale_text: «Ni siquiera intenta disimular el odio que siente por mí, Sauerback. Es motivo suficiente para acusarle de traición».

languages.text: "Euer unverblümter Hass mir gegenüber ist so offensichtlich, Sauerback, dass ich Euch schon allein deshalb der Ketzerei bezichtigen könnte."
languages.original_text: "Your unveiled hatred for me is so obvious, Sauerback, it is grounds enough to charge you with heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Euer Groll ist derart offensichtlich, Sauerback, dass er schon ausreicht, um Euch der Ketzerei zu beschuldigen."

languages.text: "Sauerback, bana karşı açıkça beslediğin nefret öyle bariz ki... Kâfirlikten yargılanman için fazlasıyla yeterli."
languages.original_text: "Your unveiled hatred for me is so obvious, Sauerback, it is grounds enough to charge you with heresy."

traits.locale_text: "Sauerback, bana karşı açıkça beslediğin nefret öyle bariz ki... Kâfirlikten yargılanman için bu bile yeter."
